body_html: Ah, yes. fp16 support was removed from cudnn bn backend (because it still requires fp32 for parameters), and probably it is not properly routed to or not supported in nn backend. @colesbury? BTW, be careful with truncating bn params to 16 bits, in our experiments on wide resnets/cifar it cost ~ half a percent of accuracy, though there may be ways to overcome this.
